text: Soni ingawe yanti Allah akwajanguichisyaga wandu yakusakala (yaakuliwendelaga mwaukali) yaakutiji pakwajanguichisya yambone (pati amâ€™bendilemo), jingaliji jilamulidwe kukwao ndema jao (jakonasichila), basi ni tukwalekaga awala wangaakwembecheya ya kusimangana Nowe mkusokonechela mwao achiyumbagayumbaga
